Title: MyHandsCursor 1.0
Description: MyHandsCursor is a demo application that uses the Kinect for Windows SDK 1.7 .
HomeWiki:
Project Description
MyHandsCursor is a demo application that uses the Kinect for Windows SDK 1.7 .

MyHandsCursor is a demo application that uses the Kinect for Windows SDK 1.7 and its skeletal tracking features to allow a user to use their hands to control the Windows mouse cursor.

Updated for Kinect for Windows SDK v1.7!
  • MOUSE MOVE
  • MOUSE LEFTDOWN
  • MOUSE LEFTUP
  • MOUSE RIGHTDOWN
  • MOUSE RIGHTUP

Additional information on starting a new project is available here: Project Startup Guide.
